title: Dan Orlovsky on Why He’s Betting Lamar Jackson to Win MVP + Fantasy Football Expert Faraz Saddiqi’s Top 5 & Most Overhyped Players for 2022 + Was Deshaun Watson's Punishment Enough? + Current Sports Story We Care Most About
itunes:title: Dan Orlovsky on Why He’s Betting Lamar Jackson to Win MVP + Fantasy Football Expert Faraz Saddiqi’s Top 5 & Most Overhyped Players for 2022 + Was Deshaun Watson's Punishment Enough? + Current Sports Story We Care Most About
description:
ESPN NFL Analyst Dan Orlovsky joins Bobby to discuss the QB’s around the league – including why he would put his own money on Lamar Jackson winning MVP this season, and Russell Wilson leading the Broncos to a division title! Plus, Upperhand Fantasy Football's Faraz Siddiqi tells Bobby who his top 5 players are, and who people should avoid heading into the 2022 season. Bobby discusses the latest agreement between the NFL and NFLPA on the Deshaun Watson scandal, and whether it was enough. Plus, the guys get to vent about whatever sports story is on their mind right now.  

Download the DraftKings Sportsbook App today: https://dkng.co/bobbysports

21+ (18+ WY). Physically present in AZ/CO/CT/IL/IN/IA/LA/MI/NJ/ NY/PA/TN/VA/WV/WY only. N/A in NH/OR/ON. New customers only. Valid 1 per new customer. Min. $5 deposit. Min $5 wager. $200 issued as eight (8) $25 free bets. Ends 9/19/22. See http://draftkings.com/sportsbook for details.
